backend/main.mo: Backend actor implementing access control, school/user profile management, and daily report storage with date‑keyed maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with app icon and root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing users by role with login, admin, kepsek, and access‑denied flows plus theme and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActiveScho: Displays a searchable, filterable list of active schools with loading, error, and edit actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSumma: Shows summary cards for active school count and daily report submissions with loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsS: Generates trend and completion analytics from daily reports using charts, with loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/admin/DailyProgr: Renders badges indicating which daily report categories are completed based on scores and attachments.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditSchool: Provides a dialog form to edit school details and submit updates to the backend.
frontend/src/components/admin/KepsekProf: Form to register a principal with a new school profile, validating input and submitting to the backend.
frontend/src/components/admin/Monitoring: Displays daily monitoring rows sorted by submission and score, with selectable detail views for each principal.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportDeta: Shows detailed daily report data including photo, timestamps, category scores, and notes in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Shared header displaying app branding and logout, clearing React Query cache on sign‑out.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/Attendanc: Handles image upload, validation, preview, and progress tracking for attendance photos.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/DailyRepo: Form for creating or editing daily reports with photo, time fields, checkboxes, notes, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/ProfileSe: Collects and saves initial school profile information including name, region, and principal.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/TodaySubm: Displays a submitted daily report summary with photo, times, notes, and an option to edit.
frontend/src/components/StatusPills.tsx: Reusable badge components for scores, submission status, and category scoring with color‑coded styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on the logged-in identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking through a React provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks to fetch and mutate backend data such as roles, schools, and monitoring rows using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and basic utility layers.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/localization/dashboardId.ts: Centralized Indonesian localization strings for admin and principal dashboards, including UI labels and messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers and rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: UI page shown on permission errors with options to copy principal ID, retry role checks, and log out.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with date-based monitoring data, summary cards, analytics, active schools, and CSV report download.
frontend/src/pages/AdminKepsekManagement: Provides an interface for admins to register and manage school principal profiles with a form workflow.
frontend/src/pages/KepsekDashboardPage.t: Displays a Kepsek’s school profile, daily report form, and submitted report data with date selection and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Presents a login screen using Internet Identity with branding, sign‑in button, and footer.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utilities for unwrapping Candid optional values and safely handling optional ExternalBlob fields.
frontend/src/utils/dayKey.ts: Provides helpers to compute normalized nanosecond day keys for date-based storage.
frontend/src/utils/reportDownload.ts: Generates and downloads admin monitoring reports as CSV, formatting fields and timestamps appropriately.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them to sessionStorage, retrieve them with fallback, and clear them from session state or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, container settings, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, including implemented features and pending requests for a school report/attendance system with date‑flexible editing and admin tools.
